Référence de la classe CommonDropdown CommonDropdown
CommonDropdown class - generic dropdown.
Est dérivée de CommonDBTM.
Dérivée par AbstractITILChildTemplate, ApplianceEnvironment, ApplianceType, AutoUpdateSystem, Blacklist, BlacklistedMailContent, Budget, CableStrand, CableType, Calendar, CommonDCModelDropdown, CommonDevice, CommonDeviceModel, CommonITILRecurrent, CommonTreeDropdown, CommonType, DatabaseInstanceCategory, DatabaseInstanceType, DocumentType, DomainRecordType, DomainRelation, DomainType, FQDN, FieldUnicity, Fieldblacklist, Filesystem, SocketModel, Holiday, ITILTemplate, ImageFormat, ImageResolution, InterfaceType, LineOperator, Manufacturer, Network, NetworkEquipmentType, NetworkInterface, NetworkPortFiberchannelType, NetworkPortType, OperatingSystem, OperatingSystemArchitecture, OperatingSystemEdition, OperatingSystemKernel, OperatingSystemKernelVersion, OperatingSystemServicePack, OperatingSystemVersion, PCIVendor, PendingReason, PhoneModel, PhonePowerSupply, PlanningEventCategory, PlanningExternalEventTemplate, Plug, PrinterModel, ProjectState, ProjectTaskTemplate, ProjectTaskType, ProjectType, RackModel, RequestType, RuleRightParameter, SolutionType, SsoVariable, USBVendor, UserCategory, UserTitle, VirtualMachineState, VirtualMachineSystem, VirtualMachineType, Vlan, et WifiNetwork. haveChildren ( )
Report if a dropdown have Child Used to (dis)allow delete action
Réimplémentée dans CommonImplicitTreeDropdown, et CommonTreeDropdown.
import() importCommonDropdown CommonDropdownimport
import (array $input)
Import a dropdown - check if already exists
Paramètres
$input
array of value to import (name, ...)
Renvoie
integer|boolean the ID of the new or existing dropdown (-1 or false on failure)
Réimplémentée dans CommonTreeDropdown, et ITILTemplate.
importExternal() importExternalCommonDropdown CommonDropdownimportExternal
importExternal ( $value, $entities_id = -1 , $external_params = [] , $comment = "" , $add = true )
Import a value in a dropdown table.
This import a new dropdown if it doesn't exist - Play dictionary if needed
Paramètres
string$value
Value of the new dropdown (need to be addslashes)
integer$entities_id
Entity in case of specific dropdown (default -1)
array$external_params
(manufacturer) (need to be addslashes)
string$comment
Comment (need to be addslashes)
boolean$add
if true, add it if not found. if false, just check if exists (true by default)
Renvoie
integer Dropdown id

showForm() showFormCommonDropdown CommonDropdownshowForm
showForm ( $ID, array $options = [] )
Print the item generic form Use a twig template to detect automatically fields and display them in a two column layout
Paramètres
int$ID
ID of the item
array$options
possible optional options:
target for the Form
withtemplate : 1 for newtemplate, 2 for newobject from template
Renvoie
bool true if displayed false if item not found or not right to display
